name: NeverGivenUp
description:
Patch 1.2v - *(Open to feedback for future changes)Graphic quality differs from the Web-Browser version. If web-browser doesn't load, download the game. Might change the gameplay into a physics-based object grabber.

The EverGiven got stuck in the Suez Canal. Use the excavator to dig up the sand!
- W,A,S,D to move - "E" to interact - "Spacebar" to dig up

The game generates random Gifs  regarding the Evergiven

Credits:
Programmer: DR
Music: Lorenzo Di Francia
Sponsored Art Designer's space booth of  Magnapopus.
